title: Punjab: Pro-Khalistan graffiti appears outside DC office, residence in Barnala; SFJ chief Gurpatwant Pannu takes responsibility
selftext: When someone whines why no Cricket World Cup matches in Mohali - this is why! Unchecked Khalistani support in Punjab is wrecking the state.
